channel.title: Projects on Plazi
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Plazi

item.title: Ongoing and past projects
item.description: Current Projects BiCIKL (EU) Biodiversity Community Integrated Knowledge Library (BiCIKL) is building the Biodiversity Knowledge Hub (BKH). more NIH-R21 Viral Spillover (NIH) The goal of this proposed project is to harness the collective power of bioinformatics, artificial intelligence (AI), and ecology to transform our understanding of taxon-specific zoonotic risk. more eBioDiv (Swissuniversities) The e-BiodDiv will provide a service for Swiss biodiversity scientists to access and disseminate their research data about species in legacy and prospective publications, and provide access to data about their collections, scientists and specimens.
